product_name: REI Polartec 100 Teton Fleece Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: Our lightweight, go-anywhere REI Polartec(R) 100 Teton fleece pants with 32 in. inseam deliver excellent comfort and function for a variety of outdoor pursuits. Offering unbeatable quality, Polartec 100 fleece is soft and warm, drying quickly and insulating even when wet. Smooth-finished elastic waistband. Reverse-coil ankle zippers help pants slide easily over footwear and allow ventilation. Stretch fabric and forward-set side seams ensure a comfortable fit; flatlock seams eliminate chafing. Zippered hand pockets.
short_description: Our lightweight, go-anywhere REI Polartec(R) 100 Teton fleece pants with 32 in. inseam deliver excellent comfort and function for a variety of outdoor pursuits.
